buildCommand: echo 'ðŸ”§ Initial working directory:' && pwd && echo 'ðŸ”§ Listing current directory:' && ls -la && echo 'ðŸ”§ Looking for apps directory:' && find . -name 'apps' -type d 2>/dev/null || echo 'apps directory not found' && echo 'ðŸ”§ Looking for web directory:' && find . -name 'web' -type d 2>/dev/null || echo 'web directory not found' && echo 'ðŸ”§ Attempting to navigate to apps/web:' && cd apps/web && echo 'ðŸ”§ Successfully in apps/web:' && pwd && NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_STANDALONE_OUTPUT=false pnpm build && echo 'ðŸ”§ Build output verification:' && ls -la .next/
